name: Leak_File_Hash
author: THA-CERT //LGO
description: Detect all unique domains name in provided file and calculate sha256 hash of it.

configurationItems.name: file_extensions
configurationItems.description: Files' extentions to exclude from domain name regular expression matching. EG: 'zip'.

configurationItems.name: API_key
configurationItems.description: Specify here the API key to access TheHive instance. (Optional: if not set, less data will be sent back)
